## Get Data

```{r}
# Get park data from OSM

query <- getbb("Brussels Capital Region") %>%
  opq() %>%
  add_osm_feature("leisure", "park") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

bruParks <- query$osm_polygons

```

## Wrangle Data

```{r}
# Calculate areas

bruParksF <- bruParks %>% 
  select(osm_id, geometry) %>% 
  mutate(area = st_area(.)) %>% 
  mutate(area = round(area, digits = 2)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(area)) %>% 
  st_transform(3857) %>% 
  slice(1:784)

```

## Build Map

```{r}
# Build the base layer

vizBase <-  bruParksF %>% 
  tm_shape() +
  tm_fill(col = "#ffffff") +
  tm_facets(by = c("osm_id"),
            nrow = 28,
            ncol = 28) +
  tm_layout(bg.color = "#b5e48c",
            frame = F,
            frame.lwd = NA,
            attr.outside = T,
            attr.outside.position = "BOTTOM",
            outer.margins = c(0.01, 0.01, 0, 0.01),
            asp = 0,
            scale = 0.8,
            main.title = "Parks in the Brussels Capital Region",
            main.title.color = "#ffffff",
            main.title.size = 1.75,
            main.title.fontfamily = "Arial Narrow",
            main.title.fontface = 2,
            main.title.position = "center",
            panel.label.bg.color = "#b5e48c",
            panel.label.color = "#b5e48c") + 
  tm_credits("#30DayMapChallenge | Day 07 | Anirudh Govind | Nov 2021 | Map data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors and available from https://www.openstreetmap.org",
             col = "#ffffff",
             size = 3.3,
             position = c("left", "BOTTOM"),
             fontfamily = "Arial Narrow")
```

```{r}
# Combine layers

viz <- vizBase
```

## Export

```{r}
# Export the map as an image to upload onto twitter

tmap_save(tm = viz,
          filename = here::here("2021/exports/Day7.png"),
          dpi = 450,
          width = 200,
          height = 200,
          units = "mm")

```
